ctags.name: ExerciseProgress
ctags.pattern: /^class ExerciseProgress(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: ProgressSummary
ctags.pattern: /^class ProgressSummary(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: avg_weight_kg
ctags.pattern: /^    avg_weight_kg: float = Field(..., description="Average weight lifted")$/

ctags.name: estimated_calories_burned
ctags.pattern: /^    estimated_calories_burned: float = Field(..., description="Estimated total calories burned")$/

ctags.name: exercise_id
ctags.pattern: /^    exercise_id: int = Field(..., description="Exercise ID")$/

ctags.name: exercise_name
ctags.pattern: /^    exercise_name: str = Field(..., description="Exercise name")$/

ctags.name: exercise_progress
ctags.pattern: /^    exercise_progress: List[dict] = Field(..., description="Progress per exercise")$/

ctags.name: get_exercise_progress
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_exercise_progress($/
ctags.signature: ( user_id: UUID, exercise_id: int, days: int = Query(90, description="Number of days of history to retrieve", ge=1, le=365), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )

ctags.name: get_progress_summary
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_progress_summary($/
ctags.signature: ( user_id: UUID, days: int = Query(30, description="Number of days to include in the summary", ge=1, le=365), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )

ctags.name: max_weight_kg
ctags.pattern: /^    max_weight_kg: float = Field(..., description="Maximum weight lifted")$/

ctags.name: progression
ctags.pattern: /^    progression: List[dict] = Field(..., description="Historical progression data")$/

ctags.name: router
ctags.pattern: /^router = APIRouter(prefix="\/progress", tags=["progress"])$/

ctags.name: total_duration_minutes
ctags.pattern: /^    total_duration_minutes: int = Field(..., description="Total workout time in minutes")$/

ctags.name: total_exercises
ctags.pattern: /^    total_exercises: int = Field(..., description="Total number of exercises performed")$/

ctags.name: total_reps
ctags.pattern: /^    total_reps: int = Field(..., description="Total number of reps performed")$/

ctags.name: total_reps
ctags.pattern: /^    total_reps: int = Field(..., description="Total reps performed")$/

ctags.name: total_sets
ctags.pattern: /^    total_sets: int = Field(..., description="Total number of sets completed")$/

ctags.name: total_sets
ctags.pattern: /^    total_sets: int = Field(..., description="Total sets completed")$/

ctags.name: total_workouts
ctags.pattern: /^    total_workouts: int = Field(..., description="Total number of workouts completed")$/

ctags.name: user_id
ctags.pattern: /^    user_id: UUID = Field(..., description="User ID")$/

ctags.name: workout_frequency
ctags.pattern: /^    workout_frequency: dict = Field(..., description="Workout frequency by time period")$/
